text: The Sleeping Beauty () is a 1930 Soviet silent drama movie directed by Georgi Vasilyev and Sergei Vasilyev.В кино — с биржи труда. Как актер Бабочкин Чапаева из Деникина сделалСПЯЩАЯ КРАСАВИЦА (1930) It stars Konstantin Mukhutdinov, Varvara Myasnikova, and Nikolay Simonov. ==Actors== * Konstantin Mukhutdinov as worker Rebrov * Varvara Myasnikova as Vera * Nikolay Simonov as worker == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian silent movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:1930 drama movies Category:Movies about witchcraft Category:Movies about death Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in forests Category:Movies set in castles Category:Movies set in Europe Category:Movies directed by Sergei Vasilyev Category:Movies directed by Georgi Vasilyev Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Sleeping Beauty (1930 movie)
